1.12.2.1.11.3: - Supporters list is now fetched on a separate thread
1.12.2.1.11.2: - Changed how Item/Block names are displayed in the CraftTweaker integration to account for the OreDictionary wildcard
1.12.2.1.11.1:
- Reduced the sticky warp you can get from being inside the dimensions by two thirds
- Crafting any of the Necronomicon now gives you warp
1.12.2.1.11.0:
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.19
- Reworked the Thaumcraft warp integration (no more permanent warp, proper timer, Dark Offspring and Evil Animals give warp now)
- Assigned Aspects to the Dark Offspring
- Warp is now given when failing rituals or when experiencing Disruptions
- Added a config option to toggle getting warp from failing rituals or experiencing Disruptions
- Materializer recipe removal in the CraftTweaker integration now takes the wildcard value into account
- Materializer recipe adding in the CraftTweaker integration now supports both the Ore Dictionary and the wildcard value
- Added CraftTweaker support for removing fuels from the Crystallizer and Transmutator
- Added CraftTweaker support for removing Crystallizer and Transmutator recipes on a output basis
- Renamed "removeCrystallization" and "removeTransmutation" to "removeCrystallizationInput" and "removeTransmutationInput" (old ones are kept for backwards compatibility)
- Added "removeAll" methods to all recipe types in the CraftTweaker integration
- Added CraftTweaker support for removing any ritual by name
1.12.2.1.10.0:
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.18
- Added CraftTweaker support for adding fuel for the Crystallizer and Transmutator
- Added a variant of the Materializer addCrystal method in the CraftTweaker integration that allows you to set a fuel value for it
1.12.2.1.9.0:
- Bewitchment integration updated to support 0.0.20.3
- The "/acritual" command now prints the registry name of Item Sacrifices and Item Outputs (instead of unlocalized)
- Added a Light Pierce modifier to the Tinkers' integration (uses Shadow Gems, has no page)
- Added Russian translation (courtesy of Hesperusrus)
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.10
1.12.2.1.8.1: - Crafting crossbow bolts using Abyssalnite, Refined Coralium and Dreadium in Tinkers Construct now works
1.12.2.1.8.0:
- Summoning rituals added through the CraftTweaker integration now supports adding custom NBT data to the summoned mob
- Infusion Rituals now also make the sacrifice (Item placed on altar) NBT sensitive if the NBT flag is enabled (for now you can disable this by calling the related ritual property modifying method after registering the ritual)
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.5.4
1.12.2.1.7.0:
- Added Bewitchment integration (Statues, Dreadlands Infused Powerstones, Ghoul Heads, Crystal Clusters and Necronomicons can be used as altar boosters)
- Split the Thaumcraft warp config option into two separate options (one for dimension travel, and one for fighting mobs)
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.5.2
- Now runs on Forge 14.23.5.2815
1.12.2.1.6.6:
- Updated GameStages integration to support version 2.0.98
- Thaumcraft aspects are now assigned through its registration event
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.4.11
- Now runs on Forge 14.23.4.2705
1.12.2.1.6.5: - Thaumcraft Aspects are now registered in preinit
1.12.2.1.6.3:
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.4.10
- Re-added Thaumcraft aspects to Items, Blocks and Mobs
- Reimplemented the Thaumcraft warp integration
- Fixed a small typo in one of the Tinkers' modifier tooltips
- CraftTweaker task processing is now done in post-init instead of init
1.12.2.1.6.2:
- Added CraftTweaker support for modifying rituals
- Added CraftTweaker support for adding/removing Materializations
- Added CraftTweaker support for adding stuff to the Crystal List (so they can be placed in the Crystal Bag, therefore usable in Materialization recipes)
- The materials added in the Tinkers integration now properly display their colors
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.4.2
1.12.2.1.6.1:
- Transmutator recipes can now be removed again (apparently broke at some point)
- Adding Crystallizer recipes works again now (things turned null because scripts run before recipes are added in the mod)
- Crystallizer recipes can now be removed again (TL;DR read thing about Transmutator recipes)
- Upgrade Kit recipes can now be removed again (roughly the same problem as the other cases, but a bit different)
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.4 (the now working recipe removal stuff is incompatible with the pre-releases)
- Compiled against 1.12.2
- Now runs on Forge 14.23.0.2500

1.12.1.1.6.0:
- Compiled against 1.12.1
- Now runs on Forge 14.22.0.2453
- Added Game Stages integration (allowing you to lock rituals behind stages)
- Added a CraftTweaker method for adding Ritual Stages (addRitualStage, first parameter stage, second ritual unlocalized name)
- Added a command to write out ritual unlocalized names in chat, or write more detailed information to a text file
- Added CraftTweaker support for Summoning Rituals
- Added CraftTweaker support for Gateway Key overrides (allowing you to specify additional dimensions where you can use Gateway Keys)
- Added CraftTweaker support for Ritual dimension mapping (allowing you to specify additional dimensions where you can perform rituals)

1.12.1.5.0:
- Ported to 1.12
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.4-pre-4
- Now runs on Forge 14.21.1.2413

- Fixed a small typo in one of the Tinkers' modifier tooltips

- Added CraftTweaker support for adding stuff to the Crystal List (so they can be placed in the Crystal Bag, therefore usable in Materialization recipes)

1.11.2.1.5.0:
- Ported to 1.11.2
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.4-pre-3
- Removed the method for adding blocks to the Shoggoth Block Blacklist (deprecated since AC 1.9.4-pre-1, has no function)
- You can now add Upgrade Kit upgrades through the MineTweaker integration
- Fixed bugs where recipes added through MineTweaker(through this integration) wouldn't display in JEI
- You can now cast bow and crossbow parts with AbyssalCraft materials
- The Better Questing integration is disabled until it's been rewritten to support BQ 2.x.x
- Now runs on Forge 13.20.0.2282

1.10.2.1.5.0:
- Ported to 1.10.2
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.4-pre-3

1.9.4.1.4.7:
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.3.9
- You can now specify if a Creation Ritual or Infusion Ritual should be nbt sensitive on the offerings
- You can now specify NBT tags to transfer over to the infused item in a Infusion Ritual
- You can now add/remove Enchantment Rituals through MineTweaker
- Removing a Infusion/Creation Ritual through MineTweaker now actually works
- You can add/remove Potion Rituals (both normal and AoE) through MineTweaker
1.9.4.1.4.6:
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.3.8
- Fixed the removePage and removeChapter methods in the MineTweaker integration
- Fixed the remove methods for rituals in the MineTweaker integration
- Any string specified as a Chapter title and/or Page text will be localized if possible
- Added a method for adding URL-based image Pictures in the MineTweaker integration
- Now runs on Forge 12.17.0.1976
1.9.4.1.4.5:
- Ported to Minecraft 1.9.4
- Bump to AbyssalCraft 1.9.2
- Bump to Better Questing 1.2.126

- Now runs on Forge 12.17.0.1962

1.9.1.4.2:
